4095533.headline: Energy Transfer To Acquire Semgroup In $5 Bln Transaction
4095533.description: Sept 16 (Reuters) - Energy Transfer LP <ET.N>::ENERGY TRANSFER TO ACQUIRE SEMGROUP IN $5 BILLION TRANSACTION.ENERGY TRANSFER LP - A UNIT AND CASH TRANSACTION VALUED AT $17 PER SHARE.ENERGY TRANSFER LP - MERGER CONSIDERATION CONSISTS OF $6.80 IN CASH AND 0.7275 OF AN ET COMMON UNIT FOR EACH OUTSTANDING SHARE OF CLASS A COMMON STOCK OF SEMGROUP.ENERGY TRANSFER LP - DEAL IN 40% CASH AND 60% EQUITY.ENERGY TRANSFER LP - DEAL IMMEDIATELY ACCRETIVE TO DISTRIBUTABLE CASH FLOW ("DCF") PER UNIT.ENERGY TRANSFER LP - UPON CLOSING, SEMGROUP STOCKHOLDERS ARE EXPECTED TO OWN APPROXIMATELY 2.2% OF ENERGY TRANSFER'S OUTSTANDING COMMON UNITS.ENERGY TRANSFER LP - NO MATERIAL IMPACT ON CREDIT METRICS FROM DEAL.ENERGY TRANSFER LP - DEAL EXPECTED TO BE IMMEDIATELY ACCRETIVE TO DISTRIBUTABLE CASH FLOW PER COMMON UNIT.ENERGY TRANSFER LP - BEYOND EQUITY ISSUED FOR TRANSACTION, NO COMMON EQUITY ISSUANCES ARE EXPECTED.ENERGY TRANSFER LP - COMBINED COMPANY EXPECTS TO GENERATE MORE THAN $170 MILLION OF ANNUAL RUN-RATE SYNERGIES.ENERGY TRANSFER LP - PLANS TO CONSTRUCT AN APPROXIMATELY 75-MILE CRUDE OIL PIPELINE BETWEEN HOUSTON SHIP CHANNEL AND NEDERLAND, TEXAS.ENERGY TRANSFER LP - ACQUISITION ALSO EXPANDS ENERGY TRANSFER'S CRUDE OIL AND NGL INFRASTRUCTURE.ENERGY TRANSFER LP - TED COLLINS PIPELINE IS EXPECTED TO HAVE AN INITIAL CAPACITY OF MORE THAN 500 THOUSAND BARRELS PER DAY.ENERGY TRANSFER LP - ANTICIPATES COMMERCIAL OPERATIONS AT TED COLLINS PIPELINE TO BEGIN IN 2021.

4170482.headline: Energy Transfer Reports Qtrly Earnings Per Share $0.38
4170482.description: Feb 19 (Reuters) - Energy Transfer LP <ET.N>::ENERGY TRANSFER REPORTS SOLID FOURTH QUARTER 2019 RESULTS.PROVIDES 2020 OUTLOOK FOR ADJUSTED EBITDA OF $11.0 BILLION TO $11.4 BILLION.QTRLY REVENUES $13,720 MILLION VERSUS $13,573 MILLION.QTRLY EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.38.Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.36, REVENUE VIEW $13.10 BILLION -- REFINITIV IBES DATA.2020 GROWTH CAPITAL EXPENDITURES OUTLOOK EXPECTED TO RANGE FROM $3.9 BILLION TO $4.1 BILLION.REDUCES EXPECTED ANNUAL RUN-RATE GROWTH CAPITAL EXPENDITURES FOR 2021 AND BEYOND TO $2 BILLION TO $2.5 BILLION.

4190588.headline: Sunoco LP Announces Revised Capital Guidance And Provides An Operational Update
4190588.description: March 24 (Reuters) - Sunoco LP <SUN.N>::SUNOCO LP ANNOUNCES REVISED CAPITAL GUIDANCE AND PROVIDES AN OPERATIONAL UPDATE.SUNOCO LP - REDUCE FULL YEAR 2020 GROWTH CAPITAL EXPENDITURES TO APPROXIMATELY $75 MILLION FROM ITS PREVIOUS GUIDANCE OF APPROXIMATELY $130 MILLION.SUNOCO LP - MAINTAIN AMPLE LIQUIDITY UNDER ITS $1.5 BILLION REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY THAT MATURES IN JULY 2023.SUNOCO LP - REDUCING FULL YEAR 2020 MAINTENANCE CAPITAL EXPENDITURES TO $30 MILLION FROM ITS PREVIOUS GUIDANCE OF $45 MILLION.

4256218.headline: Energy Transfer Reports Second Quarter 2020 Results
4256218.description: Aug 5 (Reuters) - Energy Transfer LP <ET.N>::ENERGY TRANSFER REPORTS SECOND QUARTER 2020 RESULTS.DISTRIBUTABLE CASH FLOW ATTRIBUTABLE TO PARTNERS, AS ADJUSTED, FOR THREE MONTHS ENDED JUNE 30, 2020 WAS $1.27 BILLION.REDUCED ITS GROWTH CAPITAL OUTLOOK BY AN ADDITIONAL $200 MILLION AND NOW EXPECTS TO INVEST APPROXIMATELY $3.4 BILLION IN 2020.EXPECTS GROWTH CAPITAL EXPENDITURES TO BE APPROXIMATELY $1.3 BILLION IN 2021 AND $500 MILLION TO $700 MILLION IN 2022 AND 2023.EXPECTS ABOUT 80% OF GROWTH CAPITAL IN 2020 WILL BE SPENT ON PROJECTS THAT ARE EXPECTED TO BE IN-SERVICE IN 2020 OR EARLY 2021.QTRLY NET INCOME PER LIMITED PARTNER UNIT $0.13.QTRLY REVENUES $7,338 MILLION VERSUS $13,877 MILLION.Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.28, REVENUE VIEW $11.26 BILLION -- REFINITIV IBES DATA.

4256189.headline: Sunoco Lp Reports Qtrly Net Income Per Common Unit $1.64
4256189.description: Aug 5 (Reuters) - Sunoco LP <SUN.N>::SUNOCO LP ANNOUNCES SECOND QUARTER 2020 FINANCIAL AND OPERATING RESULTS.SUNOCO LP - EXPECTS FULL YEAR 2020 ADJUSTED EBITDA TO BE ABOVE $700 MILLION, AHEAD OF ORIGINAL 2020 GUIDANCE.SUNOCO LP - MAINTAINS PREVIOUSLY ISSUED GUIDANCE FOR 2020 GROWTH CAPITAL EXPENDITURES OF ABOUT $75 MILLION.SUNOCO LP - QTRLY NET INCOME PER COMMON UNIT $1.64.SUNOCO LP - QTRLY TOTAL REVENUES $2,080 MILLION VERSUS $4,475 MILLION.

4298169.headline: Energy Transfer Reports Solid Third Quarter 2020 Results
4298169.description: Nov 4 (Reuters) - Energy Transfer LP <ET.N>::ENERGY TRANSFER REPORTS SOLID THIRD QUARTER 2020 RESULTS.QTRLY NET LOSS PER COMMON UNIT $0.29.QTRLY REVENUES $9,955 MILLION VERSUS $13,495 MILLION.Q3 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.24, REVENUE VIEW $10.15 BILLION -- REFINITIV IBES DATA.REDUCED ITS 2020 GROWTH CAPITAL OUTLOOK.PARTNERSHIP NOW EXPECTS TO INVEST LESS THAN $3.3 BILLION FOR FULL-YEAR 2020.NOW EXPECTS TO HAVE FULL-YEAR RESULTS AT HIGH END OF 2020 OUTLOOK FOR ADJUSTED EBITDA RANGE OF $10.2 BILLION TO $10.5 BILLION.

4298209.headline: Sunoco Lp Announces Third Quarter 2020 Financial And Operating Results
4298209.description: Nov 4 (Reuters) - Sunoco Lp <SUN.N>::ANNOUNCES THIRD QUARTER 2020 FINANCIAL AND OPERATING RESULTS.EXPECTS FULL YEAR 2020 ADJUSTED EBITDA TO BE AT OR ABOVE $740 MILLION.QTRLY TOTAL REVENUES $2,805 MILLION VERSUS $4,331 MILLION.QTRLY NET INCOME PER COMMON UNIT $0.96.EXPECTS 2020 GROWTH CAPITAL EXPENDITURES OF AT LEAST $75 MILLION.Q3 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.78 -- REFINITIV IBES DATA.Q3 REVENUE VIEW $3.50 BILLION -- REFINITIV IBES DATA.

4344819.headline: CenterPoint Announces Support Of Proposed Merger Between Enable Midstream Partners And Energy Transfer
4344819.description: Feb 17 (Reuters) - CenterPoint Energy Inc <CNP.N>::CENTERPOINT ENERGY ANNOUNCES ITS SUPPORT OF THE PROPOSED MERGER BETWEEN ENABLE MIDSTREAM PARTNERS, LP AND ENERGY TRANSFER LP.CENTERPOINT ENERGY - TO GET ABOUT 6.5% INTEREST IN ENERGY TRANSFER & $5 MILLION IN CASH IN EXCHANGE FOR ENABLE COMMON UNITS & GENERAL PARTNER INTEREST.CENTERPOINT ENERGY INC - TRANSACTION SUPPORTS CENTERPOINT ENERGY'S GUIDANCE BASIS UTILITY EPS GROWTH TARGET OF 6% - 8%.CENTERPOINT ENERGY - TRANSACTION SUPPORTS CO'S GUIDANCE BASIS UTILITY EPS ANNUAL RATE BASE GROWTH OF 10%.

4345151.headline: Sunoco Reports Q4 Net Income Per Common Unit $0.77
4345151.description: Feb 17 (Reuters) - Sunoco Lp <SUN.N>::ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2020 FINANCIAL AND OPERATING RESULTS.QTRLY TOTAL REVENUES $2,553 MILLION VERSUS $4,098 MILLION.QTRLY NET INCOME PER COMMON UNIT $0.77.PARTNERSHIP SOLD 1.8 BILLION GALLONS IN Q4 OF 2020, DOWN 12% FROM Q4 OF 2019.PARTNERSHIP EXPECTS FULL YEAR 2021 ADJUSTED EBITDA TO BE BETWEEN $725 AND $765 MILLION.Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.80, REVENUE VIEW $3.31 BILLION -- REFINITIV IBES DATA.EXPECTS 2021 GROWTH CAPITAL EXPENDITURES OF AT LEAST $120 MILLION.EXPECTS 2021 FUEL VOLUMES TO BE BETWEEN 7.25 AND 7.75 BILLION GALLONS.

4345114.headline: Energy Transfer Reports Fourth Quarter 2020 Results
4345114.description: Feb 17 (Reuters) - Energy Transfer LP <ET.N>::ENERGY TRANSFER REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER 2020 RESULTS.DISTRIBUTABLE CASH FLOW ATTRIBUTABLE TO PARTNERS, AS ADJUSTED, FOR THREE MONTHS ENDED DECEMBER 31, 2020 WAS $1.36 BILLION.QTRLY NET INCOME PER LIMITED PARTNER UNIT $0.19 PER UNIT.QTRLY REVENUES $10,034 MILLION VERSUS $13,720 MILLION.EXPECTS TO SPEND APPROXIMATELY $1.45 BILLION ON GROWTH CAPITAL EXPENDITURES IN 2021.FOR 2021, EXPECTS ADJUSTED EBITDA TO BE $10.6 BILLION - $11.0 BILLION, EXCLUDING ANY CONTRIBUTION FROM RECENTLY ANNOUNCED ENABLE ACQUISITION.Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.26, REVENUE VIEW $10.52 BILLION -- REFINITIV IBES DATA.

4423414.headline: Sunoco LP To Purchase Refined Product Terminals From Nustar Energy L.P. And Cato, Incorporated
4423414.description: Aug 2 (Reuters) - Energy Transfer LP <ET.N>::SUNOCO LP TO PURCHASE REFINED PRODUCT TERMINALS FROM NUSTAR ENERGY L.P. AND CATO, INCORPORATED.SUNOCO LP - DEAL FOR COMBINED PURCHASE PRICE OF $255.5 MILLION.SUNOCO LP - DEAL FOR NUSTAR ACQUISITION INCLUDES SEVEN REFINED PRODUCT TERMINALS ON EAST COAST AND ONE IN MIDWEST.SUNOCO LP - NUSTAR TERMINALS HAVE STORAGE CAPACITY OF ABOUT 14.8 MILLION BARRELS.SUNOCO LP - CATO TERMINAL IS A GASOLINE AND DISTILLATE TERMINAL LOCATED IN SALISBURY, MD WITH ABOUT 140 THOUSAND BARRELS OF STORAGE.SUNOCO LP - CO EXPECTS ACQUISITIONS TO BE IMMEDIATELY ACCRETIVE TO UNITHOLDERS.

4424183.headline: Sunoco LP Announces Second Quarter 2021 Financial And Operating Results
4424183.description: Aug 3 (Reuters) - Sunoco Lp <SUN.N>::ANNOUNCES SECOND QUARTER 2021 FINANCIAL AND OPERATING RESULTS.EXPECTS 2021 FUEL VOLUMES OF 7.25 TO 7.75 BILLION GALLONS & FUEL MARGINS OF 11.0 TO 12.0 CENTS PER GALLON.QTRLY TOTAL REVENUES $4,392 MILLION VERSUS $2,080 MILLION.QTRLY NET INCOME PER COMMON UNIT $1.73.FOR FULL-YEAR 2021, CONTINUES TO EXPECT MAINTENANCE CAPITAL EXPENDITURES OF ABOUT $45 MILLION AND GROWTH CAPITAL EXPENDITURES OF $150 MILLION.Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.97, REVENUE VIEW $4.03 BILLION -- REFINITIV IBES DATA.

4540497.headline: Sunoco Lp Announces First Quarter 2022 Financial And Operating Results And Updates 2022 Guidance
4540497.description: May 4 (Reuters) - Sunoco Lp <SUN.N>::ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2022 FINANCIAL AND OPERATING RESULTS AND UPDATES 2022 GUIDANCE.QTRLY NET INCOME PER COMMON UNIT  $2.32.QTRLY TOTAL REVENUE $5,402 MILLION VERSUS $3,471 MILLION.FOR THE FY 2022, SUN CONTINUES TO EXPECT GROWTH CAPITAL EXPENDITURES OF AT LEAST $150 MILLION.INCREASES FULL YEAR 2022 ADJUSTED EBITDA GUIDANCE TO BETWEEN $795 AND $835 MILLION.FOR THE FULL-YEAR 2022, SUN CONTINUES TO EXPECT MAINTENANCE CAPITAL EXPENDITURES OF APPROXIMATELY $50 MILLION.Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.88, REVENUE VIEW $4.50 BILLION -- REFINITIV IBES DATA.

4577044.headline: Energy Transfer Reports Strong Second Quarter 2022 Results And Increases 2022 Full Year Outlook
4577044.description: Aug 3 (Reuters) - Energy Transfer LP <ET.N>::ENERGY TRANSFER REPORTS STRONG SECOND QUARTER 2022 RESULTS AND INCREASES 2022 FULL YEAR OUTLOOK.QTRLY NET INCOME PER LIMITED PARTNER UNIT (BASIC) WAS $0.40 PER UNIT.DISTRIBUTABLE CASH FLOW ATTRIBUTABLE TO PARTNERS, AS ADJUSTED, FOR THREE MONTHS ENDED JUNE 30, 2022 WAS $1.88 BILLION.QTRLY REVENUES $25,945 MILLION VERSUS $15,101 MILLION.Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.36, REVENUE VIEW $20.40 BILLION -- REFINITIV IBES DATA.

4616096.headline: Energy Transfer Reports Q3 2022 Results And Raises 2022 Outlook
4616096.description: Nov 1 (Reuters) - Energy Transfer LP <ET.N>::ENERGY TRANSFER REPORTS STRONG THIRD QUARTER 2022 RESULTS AND RAISES 2022 OUTLOOK.NET INCOME ATTRIBUTABLE TO PARTNERS FOR THREE MONTHS ENDED SEPTEMBER 30, 2022 OF $1.01 BILLION, A $371 MILLION INCREASE.PARTNERSHIP NOW EXPECTS ADJUSTED EBITDA FOR FULL YEAR 2022 TO BE BETWEEN $12.8 BILLION AND $13.0 BILLION.QTRLY NET INCOME PER COMMON UNIT $0.29.Q3 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.38 -- REFINITIV IBES DATA.

4661244.headline: Energy Transfer Reports Fourth Quarter 2022 Results
4661244.description: Feb 15 (Reuters) - Energy Transfer Lp <ET.N>::ENERGY TRANSFER REPORTS STRONG FOURTH QUARTER 2022 RESULTS AND ANNOUNCES 2023 OUTLOOK.EXPECTS ITS 2023 ADJUSTED EBITDA TO RANGE BETWEEN $12.9 BILLION AND $13.3 BILLION.MAINTENANCE CAPITAL EXPENDITURES FOR 2023 ARE EXPECTED TO BE BETWEEN $725 MILLION AND $775 MILLION.QTRLY DILUTED EPS $0.34.Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.38, REVENUE VIEW $23.81 BILLION -- REFINITIV IBES DATA.

4701027.headline: Energy Transfer Reports First Quarter 2023 Results And Updates 2023 Outlook
4701027.description: May 2 (Reuters) - Energy Transfer LP <ET.N>::ENERGY TRANSFER REPORTS STRONG FIRST QUARTER 2023 RESULTS AND UPDATES 2023 OUTLOOK.ENERGY TRANSFER LP - QTRLY EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.32.ENERGY TRANSFER LP - INCREASED 2023 OUTLOOK FOR ADJUSTED EBITDA & CAPITAL INVESTMENTS TO REFLECT ADDITION OF LOTUS MIDSTREAM & GROWING STRATEGIC ASSET BASE.ENERGY TRANSFER LP - PARTNERSHIP EXPECTS ADJUSTED EBITDA FOR FULL YEAR 2023 TO BE BETWEEN $13.05 BILLION AND $13.45 BILLION.ENERGY TRANSFER LP - PARTNERSHIP EXPECTS ITS 2023 GROWTH CAPITAL EXPENDITURES TO BE APPROXIMATELY $2.0 BILLION.ENERGY TRANSFER LP - QTRLY REVENUE $18,995 MILLION VERSUS  $20,491 MILLION.

4700532.headline: Sunoco LP Says Increases Full Year 2023 Adjusted EBITDA Guidance To $865 To $915 Million To Include Zenith Acquisition
4700532.description: May 2 (Reuters) - Sunoco Lp <SUN.N>::ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2023 FINANCIAL AND OPERATING RESULTS.INCREASES FULL YEAR 2023 ADJUSTED EBITDA GUIDANCE TO $865 TO $915 MILLION TO INCLUDE ZENITH ACQUISITION.QTRLY TOTAL REVENUE $5.36 BILLION VERSUS $5.40 BILLION.QTRLY EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.41.Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.27, REVENUE VIEW $4.91 BILLION -- REFINITIV IBES DATA.

4797706.headline: Sunoco Sees 2024 Total Operating Expenses About $560 Million – $570 Million
4797706.description: Dec 4 (Reuters) - Sunoco LP <SUN.N>::SUNOCO LP - SEES 2024 TOTAL OPERATING EXPENSES ABOUT $560 MILLION – $570 MILLION.SUNOCO LP:  SEES 2024 ADJUSTED EBITDA $975 MILLION – $1 BILLION.

4808862.headline: Sunoco LP Announces Sale Of West Texas Assets, Acquisition Of European Liquid Fuels Terminals, And Reaffirms 2024 Adjusted EBITDA Guidance Range
4808862.description: Jan 11 (Reuters) - Sunoco Lp <SUN.N>::ANNOUNCES SALE OF WEST TEXAS ASSETS, ACQUISITION OF EUROPEAN LIQUID FUELS TERMINALS, AND REAFFIRMS 2024 ADJUSTED EBITDA GUIDANCE RANGE.ENTERED INTO A DEFINITIVE AGREEMENT FOR SALE OF 204 CONVENIENCE STORES TO 7-ELEVEN, INC..PROPOSED DEAL FOR APPROXIMATELY $1.0 BILLION.ENTERED INTO A DEFINITIVE AGREEMENT FOR SALE OF 204 CONVENIENCE STORES TO 7-ELEVEN, INC. ("7-ELEVEN") FOR APPROXIMATELY $1.0 BILLION.SUN WILL ALSO AMEND ITS EXISTING TAKE-OR-PAY FUEL SUPPLY AGREEMENT WITH 7-ELEVEN TO INCORPORATE ADDITIONAL FUEL GROSS PROFIT.ALSO ANNOUNCED ITS INTENTION TO ACQUIRE ONE HUNDRED PERCENT OF EQUITY INTEREST IN ZENITH ENERGY NETHERLANDS AMSTERDAM B.V..PREVIOUSLY ANNOUNCED 2024 EBITDA GUIDANCE RANGE OF $975 MILLION TO $1 BILLION REMAINS UNCHANGED.EXPECTS EUROPEAN TERMINALS ACQUISITION TO BE ACCRETIVE TO UNITHOLDERS IN FIRST YEAR OF OWNERSHIP.EUROPEAN TERMINALS ACQUISITION  WILL BE FUNDED USING AMOUNTS AVAILABLE UNDER SUN'S REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY.
